perks.name: Restoration
perks.desc: Killing 10 enemies within 5 seconds restores 1 Armour Segments. Cooldown is 15 seconds.

perks.name: Multi-Kill
perks.desc: Killing 5 or more enemies with one shot from a Multi-Melta restores Ammo by 1

perks.name: Auxiliary Ammunition
perks.desc: When your Primary Weapon is out of Ammo, killing 7 enemies within 6 seconds restores Ammo Reserve by 20%. Cooldown is 30 seconds.

perks.name: Thermal Boost
perks.desc: When a Ranged Weapon is 50% Overheated or you have 50% ammo in Magazine, Ranged Damage increases by 15%

perks.name: Fortitude
perks.desc: Health increases by 30%

perks.name: Strategic Stand
perks.desc: While in Heavy Stance, dealing Damage restores 15% more Contested Health, you do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits, and you cannot be knocked back but you will not be able to move

perks.name: Enhanced Force
perks.desc: Melee Damage increases by 30%

perks.name: Overwhelming Power
perks.desc: When Iron Halo is active, all Squad Members within 10 metres deal 10% more Ranged Damage

perks.name: Versatility
perks.desc: After switching Weapons, your Secondary Weapon does 20% more Damage. The Effect lasts until reloading or switching back to your Primary Weapon.

perks.name: Encompassing Aegis
perks.desc: All Squad Members take 25% less Damage from Ranged Attacks

perks.name: Additional Supplies
perks.desc: Ammo Capacity for all Squad Members' Weapons increases by 25%

perks.name: Bonds of Brotherhood
perks.desc: Reviving a Squad Member restores them to full Health

perks.name: Adamant Will
perks.desc: After Iron Halo deactivates, you take 20% less Health Damage for 10 seconds

perks.name: Consecutive Execution
perks.desc: Killing 7 enemies within 5 seconds restores Equipment Charge. Cooldown is 90 seconds.

perks.name: Emperor's Protection
perks.desc: When Iron Halo expends all its energy, 1 Armour Segment is restored for all Squad Members

perks.name: Obdurate Bastion
perks.desc: Iron Halo's Durability increases by 20%

perks.name: Field Adjustment
perks.desc: Iron Halo recharges 20% faster, but its Durability is reduced by 25%

perks.name: Power Regulator
perks.desc: Iron Halo loses energy 20% more slowly

perks.name: Saving Grace
perks.desc: Reviving a Squad Member fully restores Iron Halo's Charge and all Armour Segments

perks.name: Brute Force
perks.desc: When Iron Halo is in cooldown, Ranged Damage increases by 15%

perks.name: Wrath of the Imperium
perks.desc: When Iron Halo expends all of its energy, enemies in a 10-metre radius take significant Damage that scales with difficulty

perks.name: Offensive Capability
perks.desc: When active, Iron Halo deals Damage that scales with difficulty over time to all enemies within 5 metres

perks.name: Coolant Reserve
perks.desc: If both of your Squad Members are Incapacitated or grabbed, your Primary Weapon will not Overheat and you deal 15% more Damage

perks.name: Conversion Field
perks.desc: When Iron Halo is active, all Squad Members within 20 metres regenerate Ability Charge 50% faster

prestige.name: Auxiliary Reload
prestige.desc: Any kills of Extremis-level or higher enemies restore your Primary Weapon's Ammo by 1 Magazine

prestige.name: Conviction
prestige.desc: When your Armour is fully depleted, you take 25% less Health Damage for 10 seconds

prestige.name: Indomitable Spirit
prestige.desc: While performing a Gun Strike, you do not lose control upon taking Heavy Hits, and you cannot be knocked back

prestige.name: Honed Precision
prestige.desc: Equipped Weapon's Maximum Spread decreases by 25% when firing without aiming.

prestige.name: Duellist
prestige.desc: Perfect Parry and Perfect Block windows increase by 25%
